sense.def:
One's sister
je dekle ali ženska, ki ima iste starše kot oseba, o kateri govorimo.

seg.quote: Have you got any brothers and sisters?

sense.def:
A sister
je tudi pripadnica verskega reda.

A sister
je višja medicinska sestra, ki je odgovorna za potek dela na bolnišničnem oddelku;

Izraz
a sister
včasi uporabi ženska, ko govori o drugi ženski, s katero imata enaka prepričanja ali cilje.

seg.quote: They would go to Paris and stay with feminist sisters there.

sense.def:
The sister of something
je tisto, kar je iste vrste kot nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: The city shows every sign of outgrowing its sister.
Her sister ship was sunk by a torpedo.
